metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.9.0 - Contextual Codex model routing: GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark (15x faster reviews), per-phase model selection, gpt-4.1 (1M context), o3 reasoning. Updated API pricing, 5-tier precedence, codex-spark/codex-reasoning/codex-large-context agent types. 31 personas, 38 commands, 43 skills. Run /octo:setup.
